title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.6 - Driving, overtaking and passing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.6 - Driving, overtaking and passing

State Regulations
(a) Trucks, buses and vehicles hauling
trailers are prohibited from using the extreme left lane on the Thruway system, as posted. (b) Trucks and vehicles
hauling trailers are restricted to the right two lanes on the Thruway system, as posted. (c) The provisions of
subdivisions (a) and (b) of this section shall not apply where the normal lanes
are not available by reason of construction, accident or otherwise, and where
the left lane is used to enter or exit an interchange. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
103.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
